body.p: One of the things that we are always looking for at Gentoo is information on people using Gentoo to make their lives easier. This could be anything from using Gentoo machines as a render farm or rolled out into desktop usage, to just a small corporate firewall. Information such as this can help us better determine where we are and where we should be focusing our efforts. If you have a Gentoo success story, then we would love to hear about it! Information about large deployments or Gentoo usage in unusual markets are mostly what we are looking to receive. Send your story to usage-feedback@gentoo.org today.
